findings.title: A01.Commenting out code without explanation
findings.description: Commented out code without explanation on why it was disabled.

findings.title: A02.Potential unauthorized script upgrade
findings.description: Potential unauthorized script upgrade may allow unauthorized access to modify or update scripts.

findings.title: A03.Insecure minting of lp tokens
findings.description: Insecure minting of LP tokens without proper permission or checks, allowing unauthorized token creation.

findings.title: A04.Invalid account data handling
findings.description: The code contains commented out lines that suggest potential issues with invalid account data handling, including checks for owner permissions and validation of account information.

findings.title: Insufficient owner validation for burn_st_sol_from account
findings.description: The function does not properly validate the owner of the burn_st_sol_from account, which can lead to unauthorized access or manipulation.
